nodes.description: 安全部队在摩加迪沙霍丹区KM4街追踪一辆卡车，卡车随后爆炸
nodes.support_text: Security forces were trailing the truck on KM4 street in Hodan district when it exploded on Saturday, police captain Mohamed Hussein told the Associated Press.

nodes.description: 爆炸造成至少20人死亡、15人受伤，现场留下大规模破坏痕迹
nodes.support_text: At least 20 people have died in Mogadishu after a truck bomb detonated... At least 15 people were injured.

nodes.description: 目击者描述爆炸发生在交通拥堵的繁忙路口，导致建筑物窗户破裂
nodes.support_text: ‘There was a traffic jam and the road was packed with bystanders and cars,’ said Abdinur Abdulle, a waiter at a nearby restaurant.

nodes.description: 目击者称爆炸导致多人死亡，现场散落大量遗体
nodes.support_text: ‘I saw several dead bodies strewn about but could not count them,’ said Ismail Yusuf.

nodes.description: 袭击目标疑似位于现场的酒店
nodes.support_text: It is believed the target was a hotel.

nodes.description: 暂未公布责任方，但怀疑与关联基地组织的伊斯兰国青年党有关
nodes.support_text: The organisation, which is allied to al-Qaida...

nodes.description: 该组织正试图推翻联合国支持政府及非盟盟友
nodes.support_text: The organisation is waging an insurgency to topple the weak UN-backed government and its African Union allies.

nodes.description: 袭击发生前两日，美国非洲司令部司令曾访问摩加迪沙
nodes.support_text: The attack comes two days after the head of the US Africa command was in Mogadishu to meet Somalia’s president.

nodes.description: 青年党近年虽失去大部分控制领土，但仍频繁在摩加迪沙实施袭击
nodes.support_text: The militants still launch frequent deadly gun, grenade and bomb attacks in high-profile areas of Mogadishu...

nodes.description: Ismail Yusuf 向法新社报道袭击事件
nodes.support_text: Ismail Yusuf told Agence France-Presse about the attack.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国谢巴布组织定期发动袭击
nodes.support_text: 伊斯兰国谢巴布组织定期发动袭击
